動物用藥品名稱: 羅曼雞新城病、傳染性支氣管炎、傳染性華氏囊病不活化混合疫苗
業者名稱: 台灣羅蔓國際動保股份有限公司
效能(適應症): 預防雞新城病、傳染性支氣管炎、傳染性華氏囊病感染。
ingredients: A MINIMUM OF 10^9.0 EID50 OF INACTIVATED ND VIRUS, STRAIN ULSTER2-C; A MINIMUM OF 10^6.8 EID50 OF INACTIVATED IB VIRUS, STRAINMASS 41; A MINIMUM OF 10^7.0 EID50 OF INACTIVATED IBD VIRUS,STRAIN WINTERFIELD 2521; A MAXIMUM OF 0.05 MG OF THIOMERSAL; AMAXIMUM OF 0.35ML OF OIL ADJUVANT.
